header_text: Your children are thinking about going to college, but you think you would have to take out a loan to help send them. You remember stories you have heard of people still paying their loans when they are in retirement.

elements.text: Looking at your finances while in retirement, you don't imagine yourself racked with debt, and you think your loans will be...
